cause.description:
Do you, like me, question where your tax pounds go? Do wonder why we went to war, even though the majority of the nation was against it? Do you believe that your government should be representing the overall needs of the people in its nation, and not pandering to big corporations for extra money? Have you had enough of your government handing over your country to nations that would not give us any rights, if and when we visit them?
If you answered yes to all or any of these questions then please give your support. With your support we could make a difference. A waterfall starts with 1 drop of water, please help us to make a splash.
1. To rid corruption and fraud from power in the UK
2. To give more power to the voters
3. Drastically Improve healthcare and education
4. Stop ploughing billions into needless ventures
5. Reduce the salaries of all government officials
6. Rehaul the criminal justice system to return justice the victims and appropriately punish the guily
7. Completely change immigration policies
8. Review the benefit system
cause.mission: Stop the country being run by scoundrels and con-men! To take the power back and give it to the people!
